name: flare_smart_contracts
description: Smart contracts implementing FTSO on Flare Network.
author: Flare SC team

scripts.testHH: yarn test_unit_hh && yarn test_integration_hh && yarn test_performance_hh && yarn test_endtoend_hardhat
scripts.test_unit_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/unit yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.test_integration_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/integration yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.test_system_scdev: env TEST_PATH=./test/scdev/system yarn hardhat test --network scdev
scripts.test_limitminting_scdev: env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev env TEST_PATH=./test/scdev/system yarn hardhat test --network scdev test/scdev/LimitMinting.ts
scripts.test_minting_scdev: env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev env TEST_PATH=./test/scdev/system yarn hardhat test --network scdev test/scdev/Minting.ts
scripts.test_endtoend_scdev: cat deployment/deploys/scdev.json | env TEST_PATH=./test/scdev/system yarn hardhat test --network scdev test/scdev/EndToEnd.ts
scripts.test_airdrop_scdev: env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn test test/scdev/Airdrop.ts --network scdev
scripts.test_endtoend_hardhat: concurrently -r -k --success first "yarn hardhat node > nul" "yarn typechain-ethers-v5 && yarn typechain-truffle-v5 && wait-on http://127.0.0.1:8545 && env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn --silent hardhat run ./deployment/scripts/deploy-contracts.ts --network localhost > ./deployment/deploys/hardhat.json && cat ./deployment/deploys/hardhat.json | env TEST_PATH=./test/hardhat/system yarn hardhat test --network localhost test/hardhat/system/EndToEnd.ts"
scripts.test_performance_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/performance yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.test_longrun_hh: env FTSORND_RUNS=500 yarn hardhat test --network hardhat test/performance/implementations/FTSOMedian.ts
scripts.test_timeshift: env VM_FLARE_TEST=shift yarn hardhat test --network scdev
scripts.test_timeshift_help: echo 'Run tests with time shifts in VM'
scripts.test_timewait: env VM_FLARE_TEST=real yarn hardhat test --network scdev
scripts.test_deploy_local_scdev: cat deployment/deploys/scdev.json | env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev TEST_PATH=./deployment/test yarn --silent hardhat test --no-compile --network scdev ./deployment/test/deploy.ts
scripts.test_deploy_network_coston_private_beta: cat deployment/deploys/coston-private-beta.json | env CHAIN_CONFIG=coston-private-beta TEST_PATH=./deployment/test yarn hardhat test --network costonPrivateBeta ./deployment/test/deploy.ts
scripts.test_deploy_hardhat: cat deployment/deploys/hardhat.json | env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev TEST_PATH=./deployment/test yarn hardhat test --no-compile --network localhost ./deployment/test/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_local_scdev: yarn compile && env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn --silent hardhat run --no-compile ./deployment/scripts/deploy-contracts.ts --network scdev > deployment/deploys/scdev.json && yarn test_deploy_local_scdev
scripts.deploy_network_coston_private_beta: yarn compile && env CHAIN_CONFIG=coston-private-beta yarn --silent hardhat run --no-compile ./deployment/scripts/deploy-contracts.ts --network costonPrivateBeta > deployment/deploys/coston-private-beta.json && yarn test_deploy_network_coston_private_beta
scripts.deploy_local_hardhat: concurrently -r -k "yarn hardhat node" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:8545 && yarn typechain-ethers-v5 && yarn typechain-truffle-v5 && env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn --silent hardhat run --no-compile ./deployment/scripts/deploy-contracts.ts --network localhost > ./deployment/deploys/hardhat.json && yarn test_deploy_hardhat"
scripts.unregister_local_scdev: env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn --silent hardhat run ./deployment/scripts/unregister-deploy.ts --network scdev
scripts.unregister_network_coston_private_beta: env CHAIN_CONFIG=coston-private-beta yarn --silent hardhat run ./deployment/scripts/unregister-deploy.ts --network costonPrivateBeta
scripts.compile: yarn hardhat compile && yarn typechain-ethers-v5 && yarn typechain-truffle-v5
scripts.slither: pip3 install slither-analyzer && rm -f ./slither.json 2> /dev/null; slither . --json=./slither.json 2> /dev/null || true; node scripts/slither-parse.js ./slither.json
scripts.slither-show-stderr: pip3 install slither-analyzer && rm -f ./slither.json 2> /dev/null; slither . --json=./slither.json || true; node scripts/slither-parse.js ./slither.json
scripts.gas-snapshot: env CI=true yarn testHH; yarn gas-report
